about_the_game:
Buy the Eventide 2: The Sorcerer's Mirror Artbook & Soundtrack DLC!

The DLC contains an 88 page digital artbook in English showcasing beautiful, hand-painted, concept art from Eventide 2, with some never before seen pieces together with an in-depth description of the creative process behind the game's development. Take a trip into the colorful realm of Slavic legends and see how Tvardovsky, Yanosik and other larger than life characters based on local folklore were brought to life. Learn about the real-life inspiration behind the story and the game’s locations. A must-have for all fans of Artifex Mundi games. 

Featured Tracks:
01 - Action Theme - 0:57
02 - Cave Theme - 1:47
03 - Forest Theme - 2:20
04 - Hut Theme - 2:19
05 - Peaceful Theme - 2:40
06 - Twardowski Theme - 2:09
07 - Village Theme - 2:28

To access the digital artbook follow these instructions: Right click (or Ctrl + Click if you’re using Mac) Eventide 2 in your library. Choose Properties>Local Files>Browse Local Files. Use a pdf reader to open the artbook. Enjoy!
